nodes.text: The M8 Combat Knife was a type of knife produced by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc.. Used by the clone troopers of the Galactic Republic's clone army as a simple melee weapon, the handle of the knife was constructed from flat, black polycarbonate. The Treppus-2 vibroknife also manufactured by Merr-Sonn served as the basis for the M8 Combat Knife. The cost of an M8 Combat Knife was 150 credits.
The M8 Combat Knife was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
